He provides comfort and sustenance when we trust His plan

He gave her a long life

questions.text: Who named Maryam among the four greatest women ever?

questions.text: Despite living in a palace of disbelief, what did Asiyah do?
options: She secretly believed in the One True Allah

options: An example of those who believed

questions.text: What does the key lesson teach about true faith?
options: It can flourish even in the most hostile environments

She sent him away to safety
She hid him in the palace
She returned him to the river

We should raise him as a servant

options: He discovered her faith in Musa's God
She tried to escape the palace
She refused to obey his orders

options: She asked for revenge on Pharaoh
She asked Allah for a house in Paradise near Him
She asked to be rescued immediately
She asked for her suffering to end

questions.text: According to the Qur'an, what did Asiyah ask Allah to save her from?
options: From Pharaoh, his deeds, and the wrongdoing people

questions.text: What happened to Asiyah before the boulder crushed her?
options: Allah took her soul and showed her the house in Paradise

questions.text: What was Khadijah known as throughout Makkah?

options: She declared Allah would never disgrace someone so noble
She told him to rest and forget about it

options: She was the youngest to believe
She was the very first person to accept Islam
She was the last to believe

questions.text: What did Khadijah do with her wealth during the boycott years?
options: She saved it for the future
She gave some to the poor
She spent her entire wealth supporting Islam and feeding poor Muslims

What was the Year of Sorrow?
options: When both Khadijah and Abu Talib died within months
When the Battle of Uhud occurred

options: He sent meat to her friends and spoke of her virtues
He named a mosque after her

options: She would live a long life
A palace in Paradise made entirely of pearls

questions.text: According to the hadith from Sahih Muslim, what did the Prophet ﷺ say about Khadijah?

questions.text: Who were Fatimah's parents?
options: The Prophet Muhammad ﷺ and Khadijah

options: He would stand and kiss her forehead with tenderness
He would offer her his seat

questions.text: Who did Fatimah marry?
options: Ali ibn Abi Talib, the Prophet's cousin

questions.text: According to the hadith, what position will Fatimah have in Paradise?
options: The leader of all women in Paradise

options: The dhikr the Prophet taught Fatimah

options: Spiritual wealth through remembrance of Allah

options: Directly from her father, the Prophet ﷺ

questions.text: When did Fatimah die, fulfilling the Prophet's prophecy?
According to the key lesson, what makes someone a timeless role model?
options: Living with knowledge, piety, and complete devotion to Allah
